DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Let's you build angry crowds for DI-Guys. Only works with male and female adult civilians and crowd civilians. Male and female civilians have 4 angry animations. 10 repetitions takes about 1:15 min. Male and female civilian crowd entities have 7 angry animations. 10 repetitions takes about 3 min.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>taskRepetitions</myVariableName> <myType>integer</myType> <myLabel>Repetitions</myLabel> <myToolTip>The number of tasks to execute. Each task takes 2-5 seconds. So 20 repetitions is about one minute.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>10</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>1</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>randomness</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>Task Sequence</myLabel> <myToolTip>Sequential from starting task picks a task at random and then executes each task in order. Random picks tasks randomly.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Random</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Sequential from starting task;Random</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
